attributes.action: make it illegal for anyone to cover their face in a public place with immediate effect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The only exception will be for motor cyclists, while riding their bikes. Given the Government's plans to upgrade and increase CCTV cameras, it is essential that all are equally subject to surveillance.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
